oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dug relics from Morgan County, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These relics were recovered from the area around Montgomery, Morgan County, Tennessee. Montgomery was on the road between Nashville and Knoxville and experienced several skirmishes. The items include a portion of a Union cavalry spur, a portion of a civilian or possibly Confederate spur, and a portion of a civilian or possibly Confederate stirrup.
